price: Kitaaba (Qur’aana) keessatti (waa’ee) Muusaa dubbadhu, inni filatamaa ta’ee jira; ergamaa, nabiyyii ta’eera.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ مُوسَىٰٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مُخۡلَصٗا وَكَانَ رَسُولٗا نَّبِيّٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi mūsā innahu kāna mukh'laṣan wakāna rasūlan nabiyyan
